horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: According to the tropical zodiac, Saturn will enter Aries and align with Neptune. This represents a significant astrological alignment for all signs, particularly for those with Aries Sun, Moon, or rising placements, as this transit will last for the next two and a half years. The disciplined influence of Saturn is set to redefine aspects of your personality, career, and health during this period. While changes may not be immediately apparent, by the conclusion of this transit, you are expected to emerge as a more capable individual, potentially experiencing improved well-being. However, potential challenges may involve increased work pressure, fluctuating energy levels, or occasional delays.

The Sun, and Mars are still in Aquarius, which rules your eleventh house, so you are waiting for new long term collaborations from personal and professional life. You are very aggressively chasing your goals, and keep your hard work on, as this is the closest chances for you to get a new collaboration, new friends, and surely you are going to attend team ventures. Sudden gains, payouts, social visibility, and competition at work are also going to increase during this transit. Please make sure your ego is not causing any harm to your long term relationships. Please don’t mix money and friendships, as they can increase the existing factions.

Venus will move into the water sign of Pisces, and Mercury is also there, so you are going to feel free after so many days. There will be long trips, and updates about foreign collaborations, and you will also get some visitors from the foreign lands. There will be expenses for various matters like travelling, medicine, and creative activities. There will be private communication, risk of miscommunication, and soft endings for complex issues. You will also be interested in spiritual matters, prayer and healing.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: The taskmaster of the zodiac, Saturn will enter Aries, during this week, and this is according to tropical astrology, but for those who follow sidereal also can look at this transit. Saturn is going to be here for the next 2.5 years, so, it will transform you as a better person, and it will be conjoining Neptune in the twelfth house. However, in the long run, you will have some expenses, so you have to be prepared for that. There will be location change, long trips or updates from the foreign lands, but it will take some time, and in the long run, you will also find some backend issue at work as well.

The Sun and Mars are moving through the tenth house, so this is a high visibility time for you at work, but make sure it is for the right reasons. Since both are malefics, there are chances for arguments and power struggles with the superiors, so this is a downside of this solar transit. There will be a spike in the workload, but it is a good sign as your managers trust you. You will also get leadership opportunities, and this is also clear sign for job seekers to get a new job, so they must give their best effort as this transit will give them a very close chance to attend interviews.

Venus will change sign, and it will enter Pisces, and Mercury is also there, so the doors for new team ventures will come up. This is going to be a good and beneficial transit as you are going to get some money, or pending dues. There will be good news through messages, like positive calls, emails or text messages. You will get new friends, team associations, or network will pay off, and you will get new business ideas too.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: For Gemini rising, Sun and Moon signs will have an active time for the next 2.5 years as Saturn, the task master is going to enter Aries during this week. According to tropical astrology, this transit will be in Aries, but sidereal astrology followers also can have a look at this transit in their horoscope. This is the time for an income reality check for every Gemini Sun, Moon and rising signs. You may witness the shrinking of your friend circle, but the remaining friends will be valuable and useful for a long term. These changes will be visible in the long term, but you have to be prepared for that.

The Sun and Mars are moving through the ninth house, so you will have foreign collaborations or long distance travels for sure. This transit will give a positive result from foreign collaborations, and you will learn a lot from an international community too. There will be multiple opportunities for writing, teaching, training and publishing too. However, there are chances for ego clashes and conflicts with fatherly figures, mentors or seniors. This transit also can trigger legal issues, so stay away from anything which is complicated too. Pilgrimages, questioning the traditional belief systems, and financial planning also can come up.

Venus, the planet for love and money will move into Pisces, and Mercury is also there, so your career will be of utmost importance. Both are benefics, so there will be a lot of opportunities to get positive response from the public. You will have strong focus on career, and that will bring new job opportunities as well. Those who work in PR, media, marketing and advertising also will have better opportunities. Business owners also will have new business ideas, and they will attend business meets too. However, you should be careful with the responsibilities too.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: As per tropical astrology, Saturn will move into Aries during this week, and it will be there for the next 2.5 years. You have a golden opportunity to grow in your career, and you will surely build up a strong and meaningful career. This transit will support you to build up a serious and mature reputation. In the next 2.5 years, you will build a career with long lasting success, and this week is the right time to sow the seeds, so don’t hesitate to start your efforts. Your career direction may change in this long duration, but make sure you don’t rebel during this time.

The Sun and Mars are moving through the eighth house, so you will focus on financial growth. This is the period for intense transformation including finances, personal matters, and relationships. There will be sudden expenses, and you should be prepared for that, and avoid any kind of risky ventures as well. There are possible chances for arguments regarding shared resources, and it can be majorly with your in laws too. Kindly control your risk taking behaviour, otherwise you will land into further troubles. There will be a lot of discussions regarding tax, loans, PF and insurances too.

Venus and Mercury will be in Pisces, and that will surely bring positive news from the foreign lands. Your love for learning, reading and cultural programs will increase, and you will attend such programs too. There will be teaching, training, coaching and writing related projects as well, and they will expose you to a larger community. If you are working in a creative domain, you will be able to start some ventures with such skills. Long distance travels, and interaction with an international community also will be the part of this transit. Pilgrimages, spiritual rituals, and inputs from your elders also will be the part of this transit.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: As per the tropical zodiac, Saturn will enter Aries, which rules your ninth house of father and belief system. Saturn will be here for the next 2.5 years, and this mega transit is going to support you in taking up studies for long duration. This is the time for testing and restructuring your finances and education. The attempts for foreign collaborations for settlement or job will be slow, but it will show some results in the long duration. During this transit you will have strong and highly disciplined teachers too. You will also write long form articles, which will also get a chance to get published.

The Sun and Mars will impact the seventh house of relationship, and both the planets are not good, so you will have to be careful with the relationships. You will have a strong desire to dominate your life as well as business partner, but you should control it. You will get chance to get new contracts, but there will be conflicts, so you need to take the help of a trusted person in solving the issues. This transit will also bring opportunities for social gatherings, business meets, and some public arguments too, so you have to avoid conflicts in the public.

The transit Venus will enter Pisces and it will impact the financial matters, and this is a 50 – 50 situation. You will talk more about financial matters such as loans, tax, PF and insurances, and you will get better quote. This transit will help you to get a share from joint ventures too. You will also get some gains from spouse’s wealth, but make sure you don’t hide anything from them. This is a good time as it will heal the past traumas, and you will be attending such therapy sessions. This transit is good, and you will get sudden gains, or someone will support you through money or finances.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: Your financial matters will be a bit challenging for the next 2.5 years, as Saturn, the task master of the zodiac will enter Aries as per the tropical astrology. The eighth house indicates sudden events, so there will some sudden need of crisis management. Since Saturn indicates delays and obstacles, so there will be some delays in getting a loan or some other financial instrument. You will also have to take care of your health, especially if you were struggling with any chronic illness. This transit will make you realistic, and it will also bring loss of interest in superficial pleasures.

The Sun and Mars will impact the sixth house, so your debts, diseases and enemies will deserve more support. You will have the strength to defeat enemies, rivals and opposition, but the reality is that, there will be oppositions. There will be increased workload, and there will be work pressure as well, but avoid conflicts with your colleagues. You will get some opportunities to perform very good in tests, competitive exams, and sports. The health issues also will be solved, as you will get the right medication, and your routine, and health habits will improve. This is a good time to serve poor people, so you will go for charity programs as well.

Venus will move into the water sign of Pisces, and Mercury is also there, so the seventh house will be very active. This transit will surely bring better lifestyle for your spouse, and there will be some good news in their life. Your focus will be in the relationships, and your conversation will promote harmony between you and your life as well as business partner. This transit will bring new beneficial offers and contracts, so you will have to be alert to not miss them. Social gatherings, business meets and such activities will be the part of this transit.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: As per the tropical astrology, the task master of the zodiac Saturn will move into Aries, and it will remain in this sign for 2.5 years. This transit will bring a huge impact in the one to one personal and business relationships. This is a testing phase for your personal and business relationships, so you will have to be careful as this is a very long transit. There is a need for maturity, patience and responsibility in the partnerships, so if you are not willing for these, then don’t get into any commitments. Spouse may have work pressure or health related issues, so you need to spend more time with them.

The Sun and Mars will be impacting the fifth house, so you will naturally have a keen focus on creative projects. You have the strong desire to prove your creative skills, but this is not a good time to invest in creative projects. Children, and youngsters will have more responsibilities and they will have some achievements as well. Parents and elders will have a strong protective instinct towards the children. Single Librans will have the closest time to find someone special, but there will be clashes in the existing relationships. Learning, social gatherings, and acidity related issues also will be coming up.

Venus will move into Pisces, and Mercury is also there, so this is a good transit for better coordination at work. You can expect some support from the colleagues, and there will be progress in the projects. This transit will bring some opportunities to outsmart your competitors, and you will get more opportunities as well. This is a golden transit for job seekers as they will get closest opportunities to get a new job. You will be effectively managing the loans, and other financial instruments too. Please avoid any kind of sugar or junk intake as there are chances for food related issues.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: As per the task master of the zodiac will change the sign during this week to Aries, and it will be there the next 2.5 years. This transit is according to tropical astrology, for Scorpio Sun, Moon and rising signs will have immense transformation in the sixth house of debts, diseases and enemies. For the next 2,5 years, you will have heavy workload, and there will be increased opportunities, and job seekers will be restructuring their profession. You will also restructure your life, diet ad routine in a much better way in the long run. This transit also will help you to get service oriented roles in the next 2.5 years.

The Sun and Mars will impact the fourth house, so there will be significant developments at home. Since both are malefics, there will be some restlessness at home, so you should be very careful with the communication with the family members. There will be some issues with or for motherly figures, so you should be very kind with them. There will be property related discussions and it may end up in conflicts. You will also take up engineering works, repairing, relocation or other real estate related projects during this phase. There will be family functions, and friends meet up as well.

Venus will move into Pisces during this week, and Mercury is also there, so you will focus on your creative activities. This is the time for heightened creative activities and entertainment programs. Single Scorpio natives will have the closest opportunities to find someone special, but this is not the time to take up some commitments. Higher studies also can come up, and this is a good time to enrol in a course too. The down side is of this transit is you will be highly pleasure seeking, and you may spend too much for that.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: This is a special week, as the task master of the zodiac, Saturn will be moving into Aries during this week, and it will be there for 2.5 years. This transit will impact the fifth house, so you will have a serious focus on your education, so you will start learning a new course. You will be interested in studying, but it will be a very delayed process, but you should not be worried about that. Saturn is the planet for delays and obstacles, and there will be some delays in finding love or getting married. You will have more responsibilities and children around you.

The Sun and Mars are moving through the air sign of Aquarius, so there will be a lot of projects, hence you will have to multitask. You will be very courageous and that will make you work in having own ventures. The communication will be sharp, and it can instigate people, so make sure your speech is soft and good. There will be team work, online and offline meetings, and you can also expect meetings with your siblings too. There will be a lot of opportunities to work in projects from communication based domain, like writing, teaching, preaching and networking.

Venus will move into Pisces and Mercury is also there, so your fourth house of home will be highly active. Both the planets are natural benefics, so there will be a pleasant environment at home, but you should not be over enthusiastic with the family members. This is a good time for mother figures, as there will be improvement in their health or they will be attending some parties. Family functions will be there, and you will take major decisions for home with the support of your family members. There will be real estate deals, costly purchases for home, and home improvement projects too.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: Your ruler Saturn will enter its debilitation sign Aries during this week, and it will be in this sign for the next 2.5 years. This is according to tropical zodiac, still those who follow sidereal astrology also can analyse this transit. This transit will impact the family matters as Saturn will be in the fourth house, so there will be events connected to real estate deals, home improvement projects and costly purchases. Saturn indicates elderly people, so this is a very important transit for elderly people as they need your support. This cannot be a bad transit, as you will have to grow mature as you will have to take a lot of responsibilities.

The Sun and Mars are moving through the second house, so the financial matters will be very important, as the second house indicates finances. There will be an increase in earnings, but you can also expect a lot of expenses as well, so there will be less balance between gains and losses. The second house also indicates career, so for Capricorn Sun, Moon and rising signs will have the closest opportunities to get a job. The speech can be harsh, so there will be arguments at home as well as at work.

Venus and Mercury are moving through the third house, so you will be very busy, as there will be short trips, transfers or interdepartmental transfers as well. This conjunction will bring more work from communication and media related domain. If you were looking for an opportunity to appear in the media, then this is the right time to apply for that. You will have a lot of communication with siblings, network circles and team mates. You will also enrol in a course, which will be majorly technical and you will be able to get some gains during this week.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: Your ruler Saturn will enter the third house, as it will enter the fire sign of Aries, and it will be there for the next 2.5 years. This transit will bring multiple opportunities to start your own ventures, and you will also try to restructure the existing ventures. Since Saturn indicates delays and obstacles, so the opportunities will develop slowly, but you will get long-lasting benefits. Whatever effort you put in whichever domain, you need to be consistent. There will be multiple travel opportunities, which can be majorly short in nature. Your siblings also will have important conversations with you.

The Sun and Mars are moving through your sign, so you will have a strong need to improve your personal life. During this transit, you will have new initiatives, so that will be for new business ventures or new relationships. Since both are natural malefics, so you will be a bit short tempered, and you should control the nature. There will be minor physical issues, so physical exercises will be needed, so that you can be physically fit. You should realise that you must lead by example, not by force, especially during the solar return phase. You will take up new makeover sessions, to look and feel good.

Venus will change the signs and it will enter Pisces, and Mercury also will be in this sign. So, your speech will become very pleasant, but make sure you are realistic in your speech. There will be discussions for new job and job seekers will get the closest opportunities to get a new fulltime job or a part time job. You will have the desire for fine dining and also to dress up, so there will be costly buys. There will be family gatherings, and the communication will be smooth.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting February 8
content: As per tropical zodiac, Saturn will move into Aries, and that will impact the second house, so for the next 2.5 years, you will have financial progress, but it will be slow and steady. The universe is asking you to cut of your expenses, and practice some austerities, so that you have financial discipline. There will long lasting savings, but you will have to restructure it slowly and carefully. This is not the time to start any fancy investment plans, as there will be dangers of cheating and fraud. This transit will bring job opportunities, but they also develop a bit slowly.

The Sun and Mars will impact the twelfth house, and this is not a good transit, as the twelfth house indicates isolation and detachment, but Sun and Mars are front end planets. The expenses will be high and there will be impulsive buys as well, so you should control the expenses. You will get foreign collaborations, and updates regarding your foreign settlements. There will be restless in the nights, and the sleep will get disturbed, and this is a very normal phase during this transit. This is a good transit for spiritual life, and you will spend time in prayer and meditation.

Yes, this is a bit complex week, but there is some relief as Venus will move into your sign and Mercury is also there. Despite the emotional hassles, your personality will be glowing, and you will try to have an image makeover. You will get opportunities for interviews, debates, and single Pisces Sun, Moon and rising signs will get closest opportunities to find someone special. Your creative ideas will flow, and people will surely notice you during this time. This is the visibility window for you, so don’t forget to present yourself at your best.
